# log_channel class

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/diagnostics/log_channel
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T02:13:58.146457

---

log\_channel is the base class used to define log channels. When printing a message to a log, the log channel class name will be prefixed to the output message.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/Diagnostics }` |

## Members

This class has no members.
